title: Dharamshala
summary: Dharamshala (/ˈdɑːrəmʃɑːlə/; also spelled Dharamsala) is the winter capital city[5][6] of Himachal Pradesh, India. It has served as the location for the administrative headquarters of the Kangra district after they were relocated from Kangra, a city 18 kilometres (11 mi) away from Dharamshala, in 1855.
